name: SilverCloud Partners
tag_list: acquisition, buy-out, divestiture, entrepreneur, founders, investors, sellers, software, technology
overview:
SilverCloud Partners is a technology buy-out fund managed by a team of experienced investors and entrepreneurs solely focused on the acquisition of software companies.

Since 1996, the team has successfully acquired numerous companies and has structured and executed both simple and complex transactions where SilverCloud’s experience and resources can take an enterprise to the next level and greatly enhance its value. Whether a founder or shareholder is looking for liquidity or a company wants to divest a non-core asset, SilverCloud provides sellers with an appealing option.

SilverCloud Partners is investing their inaugural fund. The foundation of the fund is Committed Capital from the founding partners. The fund also has access to a syndicate of potential additional investors on a deal-by-deal basis. SilverCloud targets software companies in North America with a focus on the Southeast, Midwest and Mid-Atlantic of the US and will explore desirable buy-outs in other regions. The Partners target a buy-out size of $10 million or less. The fund’s mission is to provide an exit for software company founders/shareholders and divestures. In addition, buy-outs greater than $10 million will be evaluated on a case-by-case basis if the opportunity is considered promising.
